name: Trains and Winter Rains
content: No going by  no going home
And in the sky  the star alone
One more night  one more train
Where they go  no one knows
No going by  no going home
And in the sky  the star alone
No going by  no going home
And in the sky  the star alone
No going by  no going home
And in the sky  the star alone
No going by  no going home
And in the sky  the star alone
